channel.title: CVE Feed for Check Point Software Technologies Ltd. -- ZoneAlarm

item.title: CVE-2018-8790|2024-08-05T07:02:26.125Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- zonealarm
item.description: Check Point ZoneAlarm version 15.3.064.17729 and below expose a WCF service that can allow a local low privileged user to execute arbitrary code as SYSTEM.
